casebody.data:
MELKA MARINE, INC., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellee. No. 02-5166. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. March 7, 2003.

*873Before MAYER, Chief Judge, LOURIE and CLEVENGER, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
